pages.text: The Altar is important for gaining access to the more powerful items and spells! $(br2)It can either be crafted or found in rare places in your world.
For spells and curses at the $(item)Altar$() it is mostly required that it's currently night, there is enough $(thing)XP$() and sometimes the right moon phase prevails.

pages.title: Vex
pages.text: But be careful! Using the $(item)Altar$() can create lightning bolts and dangerous $(thing)Vex$()!
